```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
data <- read_excel("data.xlsx") |> 
  mutate_if(is_character, as_factor) 
```


```{r}
data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = dap, y = yield, color = herbicida)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(~ location)
```
